comprehensive_overview: SquashFS is a compressed read-only filesystem for Linux. It enables efficient storage of files, in a compressed format, with a focus on high compression ratios.
core_features: 1. High compression ratios for efficient storage of files. 2. Read-only filesystem ensuring data integrity. 3. Supports both block and file-level deduplication. 4. Can be used for embedded systems, live CDs, and other scenarios where storage space is limited.
